segments.text: Here ’ s your hot dog and beer . What happened ? Did I miss anything ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , Cal Ripen just hit a home run .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well it was 3 to 4 , but Ripen ’ s home run made it 5 to 4 since another player was on first base .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is a really great place to watch a baseball game .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , there isn ’ t a bad seat in the place .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The fans are great here , too . Not like in Philadelphia .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was a great idea to spend a day watching a game .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , it reminds you why they say baseball is America ’ s favorite pastime .
segments.speaker: S1
